result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Status Report 10-20-2022

Defendant Lazzarus Lyontae Hunt in court.  Attorney Thomas James in court for Lazzarus Lyontae Hunt.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe in court for State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set date as requested. Case adjourned to Branch 40. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.
Status conference scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-4-2022
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Status Report 9-13-2022

Defendant Lazzarus Lyontae Hunt in court with attorney Thomas James.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer V. Young. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  
Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Court enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated 08-19-2022; received and filed.
Received and Filed: Attorney Thomas James

Adjustment Number: 22A 065889,
Payable Number: 1019713,
Receipt Number: 22RP028435,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant Lazzarus Lyontae Hunt in court in person with Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal who appears by video.  Edward OBrien appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Mr Hunt says he has retained Attorney Justin Singleton. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report 7-14-2022
Received and Filed: Attorney Gary Rosenthal

Court ordered no contact with L.A.W
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Lazzarus Lyontae Hunt in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Lazzarus Lyontae Hunt in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.   Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 4. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL. Court advised defendant that due to nature of offense a sample of your DNA is required.  If the sheriff's department hasn't already obtained a sample I order them to do so.  There are circumstances that you can request the sample to be expunged from the data base pursuant to statute 165.77(4).
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
